Articles.Content:
Why does this happen mostly when I load my sandbox save file? I really want to know.

After it has loaded, it just shows the center of the KSC with the VAB on the right and the Administration on the left.

Edited March 12, 2016 by Verkio
Wow, nevermind. I just noticed it only happens when I launch a save and I'm currently out of the KSP window (because I don't use fullscreen)
Yup known problem and the KSCLockup mod from my sig can fix it :-)
